name: Cultural Breakfast in Buzzing Chinatown
description:
This trip is designed for you who love food, food, and food.  From traditional street food stall to luxurious restaurant, you can taste authentic delicacies everywhere in Jakarta. But this trip will specifically bring you to Chinatown, a place where you could taste authentic Indonesian food that has been inherited for several generations by Chinese residence of Jakarta. 
Even in the early morning , all the best food in Jakarta comes out and this is the best time to hunt for some delicious breakfast. This walking tour will take you around the parts of Chinatown, where you will experience the feel of being in a real culture melting pot. You could taste sweet street food and also some hearty breakfast that will leave you wanting more and more. You will enjoy the delicious treats while I explain to you what they are made of and how they are made. By the end of the trip, I guarantee you a happy tummy!
